entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-08-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Interpolated String Handlers: Implicit conversions to strings #5077
    Design Review

Closed

  • [Proposal]: Record Constraints #4453
  • Overload resolution and inferred lambda / method group delegate type: potential breaking change #4674
  • Conditional operator without else #5072

Updated

  • [Proposal]: Static abstract members in interfaces #4436
    Proposal champion, Working Set
  • Interpolated String Handlers: Implicit conversions to strings #5077
    Design Review
  • [Proposal]: Attributes on Main for top level programs #5045
    Proposal, Proposal champion
  • [Proposal]: Explicit lambda return type #4934
    Proposal, Proposal champion, 10.0
  • [API proposal] Attribute for passing caller identity implicitly #4984
    Proposal, Proposal champion
  • [Proposal]: Remove restriction that interpolations within a non-verbatim interpolated string cannot contain new-lines. #4935
    Proposal, Proposal champion
  • [Proposal]: Cancel Async Functions Without Throw #4565
    Proposal
  • [Proposal]: nested members in `with` and object creation #4587
    Proposal, Proposal champion
  • [Proposal]: Raw string literal #4304
    Proposal, Proposal champion, Working Set

PullRequests

Merged

  • Add partial base type nullability differences agenda item #5069
